Hounds of Love

Dog Walking And Home Visits For Pets

Welcome!

Hounds of Love is an independent, reliable and friendly dog walking and pet care service. We're based in the beautiful Somerset countryside on the outskirts of Bath.

The extraordinary bond we share with our pets is beyond measure. They are adored and treasured members of our families. So, whether you are out at work or away on a trip, we are here to offer that same level of love and care.

We currently offer dog walking and pet home visits.

Day care and overnight stays will be considered, for well behaved clients, but XXX

We are fully insured and DBS (CRB) checked.

Weekends/ Bank holidays - Will be considered

Bespoke services available.

Prices

Dog Walking

Walk time Prices Additional Dogs
30 minutes £7.00 + £3.50 per dog
1 hour £10.00 + £5.00 per dog

1-1 Walks (with the exception of extra dogs in one family). Tailored to suit your dog’s individual needs.

Following completion of a new client form, a free meet and greet session is recommended. Allowing all parties to get to know each other and find out some important background information.

All new dogs are walked on the lead until we are satisfied with their recall. Your dog/s will not be walked off lead without your written consent.

1-1 walks are especially suitable for a nervous dog or a dog with behavioural issues. Your dog will benefit from our undivided attention. We can of course continue to use any training commands that the dog has been used to following.

Text, photo or email updates post walk/ home visit are available on request. It’s comforting to know that your Once settled back at home your dog/s will be given fresh water, treats and cuddles.

We ask that all dogs is wear an ID tag and that they have been identi-chipped by a vet (now UK law as of April 2016). We also ask that your pet is up to date with vaccinations, for the welfare of your dog and others in our care.

Pet Visits

Visit time Prices
30 minutes £7.00
1 hour £10.00

These home visits are ideal for all pets: especially puppies and kittens, senior dogs, bitches in season or pets that are unwell or in recovery from surgery. Allowing your dog a toilet break and stretch in the garden or a quick walk around the block. We’ll also feed your pet, replenish water bowls and offer copious amounts of fuss and play. We can also administer any medications, grooming, and clean up any accidental messes!

These visits are also geared towards caring for and feeding cats and any other small pets whilst you are away on holiday. That way they get to keep their routine and home comforts.

Whilst at your home I can also be there to switch on/off lights or the radio, pull curtains, put out rubbish and recycling, water plants/garden etc

Day care and overnight stays

Will be considered. Following a free meet and greet session. It is imperative that your dog has already been introduced to my dog and both are comfortable and relaxed in each other’s presence.
